00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * Interface to power-throttle control, measurement, and debugging
00044  * facilities.
00045  *
00046  * <hr>$Revision: 91010 $<hr>
00047  *
00048  */
00049 
00050 #ifndef __CVMX_POWER_THROTTLE_H__
00051 #define __CVMX_POWER_THROTTLE_H__
00052 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00053 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00054 extern "C" {
00055 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00056 #endif
00057 
00058 /**
00059  * a field of the POWTHROTTLE register
00060  */
00061 union cvmx_power_throttle_rfield {
00062         uint64_t u64;
00063         struct {
00064 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00065     uint64_t maxpow:8;           /* 63:56 */
00066     uint64_t power:8;            /* 55:48 */
00067     uint64_t thrott:8;           /* 47:40 */
00068     uint64_t hrmpowadj:8;        /* 39:32 reserved in cn63XX */
00069     uint64_t reserved:3;         /* 31:29 */
00070     uint64_t ovrrd:1;            /* 28  reserved in cn63XX */
00071     uint64_t distag:1;           /* 27 */
00072     uint64_t period:3;           /* 26:24 */
00073     uint64_t powlim:8;           /* 23:16 */
00074     uint64_t maxthr:8;           /* 15:8 */
00075     uint64_t minthr:8;           /* 7:0 */
00076 #else
00077     uint64_t minthr:8;
00078     uint64_t maxthr:8;
00079     uint64_t powlim:8;
00080     uint64_t period:3;
00081     uint64_t distag:1;
00082     uint64_t ovrrd:1;
00083     uint64_t reserved:3;
00084     uint64_t hrmpowadj:8;
00085     uint64_t thrott:8;
00086     uint64_t power:8;
00087     uint64_t maxpow:8;
00088 #endif
00089     } s;
00090 };
00091 typedef union cvmx_power_throttle_rfield cvmx_power_throttle_rfield_t;
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * Return Cop0 Power Throttle register value for a given Core
00095  *
00096  * @param cpuid  : Core id
00097  * @return  Return COP0 PowThr value
00098  */
00099 extern cvmx_power_throttle_rfield_t cvmx_power_throttle_show(int cpuid);
00100 
00101 /**
00102  * Get the POWLIM field as percentage% of the MAXPOW field in r.
00103  *
00104  * @param ppid : Core to find the percentage
00105  * @return  On success return percentage or -1 on failure
00106  */
00107 extern int cvmx_power_throttle_get_powlim(int ppid);
00108 
00109 /**
00110  * Throttle power to percentage% of configured maximum (MAXPOW).
00111  *
00112  * @param percentage    0 to 100
00113  * @return 0 for success and -1 for error.
00114  */
00115 extern int cvmx_power_throttle_self(uint8_t percentage);
00116 
00117 /**
00118  * Throttle power to percentage% of configured maximum (MAXPOW)
00119  * for the cores identified in coremask.
00120  *
00121  * @param percentage    0 to 100
00122  * @param pcm       bit mask where each bit identifies a core.
00123  * @return 0 for success and -1 for error.
00124  */
00125 extern int cvmx_power_throttle(uint8_t percentage, cvmx_coremask_t *pcm);
00126 
00127 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00128 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00129 }
00130 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00131 #endif
00132 #endif /* __CVMX_POWER_THROTTLE_H__ */
